alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 9:50AM PDT until March 13 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. From 10 AM to 5 PM, additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Stehekin, Holden Village, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Motorists planning to drive over Stevens Pass should prepare for winter driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Exposed ridgetops will experience west winds gusting as high as 45 mph leading to blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
